column3: man na’á man kull quṭurin waduná

column2: fahuw fī al-khuluq haddá man rabbih
kam lah man āyah jullat famā
yawm yaqūl al-shafī‘ fīh anā lahā
mā lī siwāh ghadan shafī‘un yaḥmīnī
huw wasīlatī fī al-dunyā wafī al-dīn
wanqūl yā rasūl al-lah yā khayr al-anām

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. qaṣīdah. mjzū’ al-rajaz

column3: ará ḍarīḥak min qabl āinqiḍā’ ajalī

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. tawshīḥ muḍāri‘ lilḥalbī

column2: in talqah al-usd fī ājāmihā tajim
man ya‘taṣim bik yā khayr al-wará sharafan
